questions.question2: What does a Prompt Template do?

name: TEST_CITATIONS
description: The tool provides answers to questions about telecom and utility services, including TV, internet, electricity, and phone services. It pulls information from a structured knowledge base to address queries related to billing, payments, contracts, service changes, rewards, and account management._COPY

name: Magnet AI Manual
description: RAG based on Magnet AI Manual. Magnet AI is a free and open-source solution that makes it simple for CRM admins to bring Generative AI capabilities into their systems.

name: TELCO (multilingual)
description: The tool provides answers to questions about telecom and utility services, including TV, internet, electricity, and phone services. It pulls information from a structured knowledge base to address queries related to billing, payments, contracts, service changes, rewards, and account management.
